Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 90th overall pick, by Colorado in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Dave Gurrola (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/3/2015, off Barry Sechrist (STL)...
Was selected to the 2015 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/5/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
Injured on 7/30/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/17/2019 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/28/2020 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 2/4/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2021...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/13/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $950,000 per year...
